attributes.action: Set a date for a 'Switch Off Standby Day".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People keep saying that if everyone switched all their electrical items that they normally leave on standby, that Britain would need two less power stations.  I think we need to know if this is true.  Also, I think this special day would help people to feel that they could act together to help the environment.
